markdown: **Activate** <actions string="" />1 minute (command, envision);     **Effect** You imprint upon the weapon, proclaiming yourself as its owner. This allows you to use the rune's second activation until someone else uses this activation or succeeds at a Will save to prevent you from using the second activation.
name: 1 minute (command, envision)
